AgriGuru

{/* About Section */}

About AgriGuru

Empowering Indian Agriculture
AI-powered platform for personalized crop advice, weather, government schemes, organic tips, and satellite insights.
{/* Features Section */}

Key Features

  • 🌱 Crop Recommendation
  • ☀️ Weather Forecast
  • 🧑‍🌾 Organic Tips
  • 🏛️ Government Schemes
  • 💰 Crop Prices (Mandi Rates)
  • 🤖 AI Chatbot (English, Hindi, Kannada)
  • 🛰️ Satellite Insight (NDVI & Crop Health)
{/* What Sets Us Apart Section */}

Why Choose Us?

  • AI-Driven: Region-specific, actionable recommendations
  • Integrated: Weather, satellite, and government data in one place
  • Inclusive: Multilingual, mobile-first, and accessible
  • Farmer-Focused: Designed for real-world impact
{/* Inspiration Section */}

Our Inspiration

Rooted in Resilience
Inspired by the spirit of Indian farmers, AgriGuru bridges technology and tradition for a sustainable future.
